item.title: Mentioned by insideTORONTO.com
item.description:
MP launches bid to 're-protect' Humber River - Inside Toronto
Wearing rain boots while standing in the Humber River in Cruickshank Park Tuesday, York South-Weston NDP MP Mike Sullivan said he would introduce a private member's bill Wednesday aimed at protecting the river. The legislation would undo a threat ...
